CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive anti-tank
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: buck grenade
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with many buckshot pellets which spread in a tight pattern.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armo-piercing composit rigid
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The APCR projectile has a core of a high-density hard material. \nThe projectile is lighter: up to half the weight of a standard AP shot of the same caliber. The lighter weight allows a higher muzzle velocity. The kinetic energy of the shot is concentrated in the core and hence on a smaller impact area, improving the penetration of the target armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary light
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses the lightweight metal to reduce bullet weight. Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and increasing armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing high-explosive incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary and high-explosives compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and increasing armor penetration.
